Html:

The sample 01simple.php has an accented text being inserted in a cell and it works! The only difference is that 01simple.php is at a folder "Tests" at the same level of "Classes" folder and my program is not in a folder at the same level of "Classes" folder (and cannot be!).

Any idea?

Regards,

Marcelo Trópia
